subtitle: hi i'm dr josh schwartzbaum in a world
that pulls us in so many directions it
can be hard as individuals to discover
our meaning
i met rabbi jacobson 10 years ago and
was immediately impressed by his ability
to connect science psychology philosophy
and the torah
he is a person who truly cares for
others and whose insights are applicable
to people from every background
he has taught me new ways to approach
life and how to better connect to my
meaning and purpose and since applying
his lessons i've been able to have a
greater impact on the people around me
if you have a chance to learn from rabbi
jacobson in person or online go for it
you'll gain a lot of new ideas and you
just may find that extra meaning in life
[Music]
